name: House Call (Slowed Minds)
description:
HAPPY HALLOWEEN!

Made for the 32-Bit Game Jam 2020, House Call is a nostalgic horror game made in the style of the PlayStation 1 genre classics like Resident Evil and Silent Hill. You control a psychic medium named Delphia as she explores a haunted house and evades ghosts. Now available for PC and Mac!

Full story:

JUNIPER HOUSE
MIDDLESVILLE, PENNSYLVANIA

The house has been empty on and off for nearly ten years now. There’s interest, sure, over the years, but eventually it always landed back on the market. I’m sure you’ve heard in passing, It’s become quite the impossible project, passed from desk to desk until it finally landed in My lap. Previous owners cited frightening noises, and there were rumors even of previous agents going missing after selling the property. Utterly ridiculous but..... 


I want a professional opinion. Something to have printed out to hand to the more superstitious buyers. I made a call to a friend of a friend in city who’s handled “supernatural situations” like this. It took some coaxing, but tomorrow afternoon, Delphia Jones is headed to Juniper House.

All art assets made by Archie and Katy Brown. Sound effects from Freesound.org . "The Voices" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Slowed Minds 2020
